# About

I am a psychologist with a broad range of research interests. In my PhD, I investigate the effectiveness of psychotherapy and digital mental health interventions for depression and anxiety. In my job as a psychometrician, I investigate ways to improve the usability of patient reported outcome measures for clinicians and researchers a like.
